page_content: distrib-comm₂ : (d x k n : ℕ.ℕ) → (d ℕ.+ (x Agda.Builtin.Nat.* (n ℕ.+ k))) Agda.Builtin.Equality.≡ (d ℕ.+ (x Agda.Builtin.Nat.* k) ℕ.+ (x Agda.Builtin.Nat.* n))

metadata.name: distrib-comm₂
metadata.signature: (d x k n : ℕ.ℕ) → (d ℕ.+ (x Agda.Builtin.Nat.* (n ℕ.+ k))) Agda.Builtin.Equality.≡ (d ℕ.+ (x Agda.Builtin.Nat.* k) ℕ.+ (x Agda.Builtin.Nat.* n))

page_content: mid-to-left : (a b c : ℕ.ℕ) → (a ℕ.+ (2 Agda.Builtin.Nat.* b) ℕ.+ c) Agda.Builtin.Equality.≡ (b ℕ.+ (a ℕ.+ b ℕ.+ c))

metadata.name: mid-to-left
metadata.signature: (a b c : ℕ.ℕ) → (a ℕ.+ (2 Agda.Builtin.Nat.* b) ℕ.+ c) Agda.Builtin.Equality.≡ (b ℕ.+ (a ℕ.+ b ℕ.+ c))

page_content: +-assoc-comm : (a b c d : ℕ.ℕ) → (a ℕ.+ (b ℕ.+ c ℕ.+ d)) Agda.Builtin.Equality.≡ (a ℕ.+ c ℕ.+ (b ℕ.+ d))

metadata.name: +-assoc-comm
metadata.signature: (a b c d : ℕ.ℕ) → (a ℕ.+ (b ℕ.+ c ℕ.+ d)) Agda.Builtin.Equality.≡ (a ℕ.+ c ℕ.+ (b ℕ.+ d))
